text:
in the default publication, go to the site tab. "cut" a node out. try to paste
it at the root level by clicking on "authoring". all edit options are greyed out.
hence, there is no way to ever paste something in the root level of the site tree.
if it's not fiendishly complicated, we should fix this for 1.4.0.
